Another not very well-known museum which is worth the detour and which offers interesting temporary exhibitions, also located in a park. To get there, the museum and the park are served by RATP bus lines 122 and 301.

Very pleasant museum, well located near Paris, very warm welcome, the staff takes great care, the exhibits are very rich and of great scenic diversity (paintings, photos, sculptures, newspapers...), to see at the moment, Marx and France
Interesting exhibition at the moment on sport in the suburbs
Nice little museum, exhibition in the French town. Very interesting. Super friendly welcome, 4 euros entry.

Very interesting museum, which has exhibitions on social history. Very warm welcome from the curators and cultural mediators, very available and invested, I took my students there several times for guided tours and workshops which were very well organized and very educational, very stimulating for the students!
Excellent exhibition on the "commune of Paris" Interesting place run by volunteers.

Located in Montreau Park, the bust of President Ho Chi Minh is part of "Ho Chi Minh Space," surrounded by green trees and bamboo clumps, creating a simple but meaningful space. bold Vietnamese culture.  The statue is a gift from the Hanoi Museum to the city of Montreuil, erected and inaugurated on May 19, 2005, on the 115th birthday anniversary of President Ho Chi Minh.  The statue is based on the model of famous sculptor Tran Van Lam, is 1.1m high and placed on a 3m high pedestal.

A former private mansion within the vast Montreal park, there is little or no permanent exhibition but regularly thematic exhibitions mainly on the ground floor. Currently on Marx, life and family, and his time in France.
Fascinating exhibition on Marx. Guide (Thomas) at the top!
I'm waiting for it to open
Excellent cultural experience, particularly thanks to a very warm and enthusiastic welcome (especially the young Ilyes at reception), patient, caring and dedicated! I recommend!
I enjoyed the visit, very interesting exhibition. Pleasant welcome.
wonderful museum which invites you to discover the history of the workers' movement, its upheavals, its future. Major exhibition and numerous meetings throughout 2018. museehistoirevivante.fr
Great exhibition on Marx. And the guide was great. I really recommend this exhibition.
This is a really very interesting little museum, it is located inside a park. Currently there is a beautiful exhibition on the Paris Commune.
The exhibitions are very interesting, plus they really welcome Thomas, Fannie and Manon are very nice
Varied, well illustrated, interesting, incredible place
Since I am the scientific director, how could I not invite you to visit this museum located in the beautiful Montreau Park?

The Montreuil-sous-Bois Living History Museum offers all audiences the opportunity to discover the history of the labor movement, thanks to its iconographic collections (posters, photographs and other documentary resources), as well as guided tours and educational workshops. .
This museum that I have known for years and which knows how to renew itself and keep up with the events
The president of the Rosny Historical Society, Mr. Pierre Dijol, will be happy to welcome you and will introduce you to this Rosneen museum with very rich comments.
